roleset.name: pour concrete over
roleset.note: CONCRETE_OVER-V NOTES: A simple "concrete" lemma also seems plausible: I would like to concretethe driveway, but this did not occur in any instances, nor could anyexamples of this sort be found in internet research. (from concrete.01-v)

example.name: the one example
example.text: If the scheme didn't work out then the Bureau would concrete over the site as originally planned.
example.arg: if the scheme didn't work out

roleset.name: set in stone, not abstract
roleset.note: CONCRETE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6. (from concrete.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: For under an exam - oriented education system , an exam question for the students has one and only one answer , and the question is also concrete , without divergence or selection .
